title: The House in the Hills
description: Fiona, Ninian and Hugh find a dilapidated old croft in the wild hills of Scotland; they paint and repair it to make a wonderful home for themselves. Of course it is the perfect place for adventures they stalk deer, they sail in the Black Swan and with the help of the mysterious Fergus, search for a legendary cave.
author: Olivia; Illus Lumsden Phyllida Fitz Roy
